mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS "productId", brand_name AS "brandName", product_name AS "productName", product_num AS "productNum", brand_id AS "brandId", spec_value AS "specValue", unit_value AS "unitValue", catalog_fee AS "catalogFee", p.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM st_product p left join st_product_brand pb ON (p.brand_id = pb.id) WHERE p.id = #{productId}
